## getAggregatedSourceContents() function

The main method. End-to-end conversion of list of .js or .js.map filepaths/URLs to source contents.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getAggregatedSourceContents(urlsOrPaths: string[], dependencies: GetAggregatedSourceContentsDeps): Promise<Record<string, string>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  urlsOrPaths | string\[\] |  |
|  dependencies | [GetAggregatedSourceContentsDeps](./dl-webapp-sources.getaggregatedsourcecontentsdeps.md) |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Record&lt;string, string&gt;&gt;

- mapping from source path to source contents

## Example


```typescript
const sourceContents = await getAggregatedSourceContents(
  ["https://example.com/bundle.js", "c:/Users/you/bundle.js"],
  dependencies
)
```
